game.name: Sally Shopping Mall Trip
game.description:
Sally is a very cute girl and she generally loves going outside to shop for multiple trendy and fashionable outfits. Today she has again made out a plan to go to the mall for a wonderful shopping trip. All is good, but this time she seeks for your help. Why do not you join her to make her shopping experience an easy affair? Join Sally Shopping Mall Trip and be prepared to create a jaw-dropping look for this gorgeous fashionista! She also gives a photoshoot in the mall. 

In her wardrobe, you would spot an awesome trendy outfit combination that includes fashionable tops, matching bottoms, cool pair of shoes and fabulous accessories. Also take care of her hairstyle before she leaves home for the mall. Give your girl her favorite blue color shirt with pink flower prints, a cherry colored shirt, a purple top with fringes on the bottom, an off-shoulder pink top, or a wrapped white strapless top and combine it with a pair of red shorts with flower prints, a pair of jeans with butterfly or star prints or a pair of high waist white and grey striped pants!

Make sure to complete her look with some cool accessories including a pair of matching sandals or sneakers. Choose any hairstyle out of an edgy blue color or blonde curls for the girl. Complete her dress with the help of a wonderful necklace and a chic handbag in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls! Once you are done, get ready to see how many likes she is able to secure for her new look. All the best to create a noticeable look for the girl and become a true fashion influencer, no download required!
